introBegin: I know a little bit about a few things, but mostly, I like to work with Node.js.
introTwo: I received my masters in Computer Science from the University of California, Irvine in June 2019. Before my masters, I spent two years with NIIT Technologies working as a full-stack developer.
introThree: If you need a website made, or if you're looking  to hire for a software engineering role, contact me!
